    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_101990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Expansion in rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion in den Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion dans les roches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão nas rochas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione in roccie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση στους βράχους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión en rocas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the rock surface heats up and cools down first than the middle of the rock. The surface expands the most which causes cracks.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cracks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Felsenoberfläche
oben erhitzt und kühlt unten zuerst als die Mitte des Felsens ab. 
Die Oberfläche erweitert das die meisten, das Sprünge 
verursacht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la surface de roche
rechauffe et refroidit d'abord que le milieu de la roche. La 
surface augmente les la plupart qui causent des fissures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a superfície da 
rocha se aquece acima e esfria-o para baixo primeiramente do que o 
meio da rocha. A superfície expande o a maioria que causa 
rachaduras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la superficie 
della roccia riscalda e si raffredda in primo luogo che la metà della
roccia. La superficie espande il la maggior parte che causi le 
crepe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η επιφάνεια βράχου 
θερμαίνει επάνω και δροσίζει κάτω πρώτα από τη μέση του 
βράχου. Η επιφάνεια επεκτείνει που πιό πολύ προκαλεί τις 
ρωγμές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la superficie de la
roca calienta para arriba y se refresca abajo primero que el centro de
la roca. La superficie amplía el la mayoría que causa las 
grietas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abkühlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprünge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
